artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: man dressed as clown wearing tiny hat, large collar, tall buttoned plaid knickers, which stocking and slippers; clown stands in front of a partially drawn curtain with part of an elephant visible at left; text at top and bottom: "LE CLOWN MEXICANO / CUADERNO / No 5. / PUBLICADO / por / A. VANEGAS ARROYO. / MEXICO."
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: El Clown Mexicano (Mexican Clown), plate 13 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
